hero.title: Debt collection
hero.subtitle: Professional solution for effective collection of your receivables

mainSection.title: Debt collection
paragraphs: We offer debt collection in a wide range of areas including accounting records or unpaid invoices.

We professionally assess each receivable and then propose the most appropriate solution procedure including, among other things, a comprehensive legal analysis. As part of debt collection, we specialize in invoices, loans, promissory notes, wages, rent or compensation for damages.

specialization.title: We specialize in:
items: collection of invoices for delivered goods and performed work
collection of debt acknowledgment for any reason of origin
collection of debt from a money loan agreement
